title: Framers: Human Advantage in an Age of Technology and Turmoil
itunes:title: Framers: Human Advantage in an Age of Technology and Turmoil
description: Kenneth Cukier, senior editor at The Economist and co-author of the book Framers, talks about how mental models, or frames, enable humanity to find the best way through a forest of looming problems.
content:encoded: Kenneth Cukier, senior editor at The Economist and co-author of the book Framers, talks about how mental models, or frames, enable humanity to find the best way through a forest of looming problems.

itunes:summary: Kenneth Cukier, senior editor at The Economist and co-author of the book Framers, talks about how mental models, or frames, enable humanity to find the best way through a forest of looming problems.
itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
